attributes.action: have a word with your mate Rupert Murdoch to reinstall 'Fanboy' to its rightful place within the NME magazine.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The satirical cartoon 'Fanboy' has been discontinued by the New Musical Express (NME), and replaced by an unimaginative take on the previous weeks front cover. The illustrations are by David Bailey, a highly acclaimed artist from Manchester - renowned for his gig posters.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
